bike.description: Monoque C-4 carbon with 12K weave carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-4 carbon  curved stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-770 Fuji Bonded Carbon Integrated w/ 1 1/8" Alloy Steerer
FSA Gossamer MegaExo, w/Integrated spindle, 7075 CNC 34/50T Chainrings
Shimano R-700 shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Cane Creek SCR-3 dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Cane Creek 1 1/8" Integrated, w/ Convex hollow alloy spacer
Fuji UltraLite 6061 Double Butted, 31.8mm w/Anatomical drops
Fuji Pro Ultalite Forged Alloy +/- 7 degree
